Name: getWeather
Description: get the weather for a given city
JS: function getWeather(city) { return { city: city, temp: 70, condition: "sunny" }; }

Name: __store__
Description: store a value in a variable

Name: __fetchHTTP__
Description: fetch the contents of a URL over HTTP
JS: async function __fetchHTTP__(url) { const res = await fetch(url); return await res.text(); }

Name: __getUserAge__
Description: get the age of a user

Name: __getSecretValue__
Description: get a secret value from the vault

Name: __now__
Description: get the current date and time
